abstract: This latest video by Inez and Vinoodh highlights Pierre Balmain's women's collection, featuring Abbey Lee and her band Our Mountain.
snippet: This latest video by Inez and Vinoodh highlights Pierre Balmain's women's collection, featuring Abbey Lee and her band Our Mountain.
lead_paragraph: Balmain's new diffusion line, Pierre Balmain, made its debut in Paris on Sunday and can best be described as a greatest-hits collection, but at one third of the price. All of the Balmain pieces that we've come to love - black motocross jeans, zebra-print button-down shirts and shrunken leather jackets - came styled in exactly the right model-off-duty way. The men's wear, too, was very rocker-looking, with leather bombers and silky button-down shirts neatly tucked into skinny jeans.
